duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and execute successful strategies for the assigned territory and customers.
Build and maintain excellent business relationships with existing and potential customers.
Identify areas of opportunity and develop tactical plans to drive sales and profit growth.
Obtain volume objectives in the assigned market and represent company products and programs.
Participate in discussions with key customers to determine unmet needs and communicate this information to the internal organization.
Generate market business strategies to fulfill sales and product budget goals.
Train distributors on the advantages and benefits of products and services.
Participate in market blitzes aimed at selling specific products to key accounts for selected distributors.
Develop a successful food show booth design as per instructions, and provide operators with solutions in a food show-selling environment.
Maintain regular communication on a weekly basis, including phone calls and reports.
Monitor and report market dynamics that affect the trajectory of the business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
